--- Super Cyclonus <supercyclonus@...> wrote:

> 
> Because while the others where distracted with Hot-Rod, this
> secretive
> being had another goal, and cloaked in silence and shadow he was well
> on his way.

As the Decepticons and Predicons moved around the base, the dark shadow
slipped from one nook to another. Cloaked and silent it slipped into an
alcove, and then through a door to what appeared to be a computer room
of some sort. Perhaps it was a library, perhaps just a maintaintance
access point, with a small shrug it moved up to a computer console and
began attempting to hack the computer systems, desiring to dump the
information into a memory module that it slid into place. 

From the skill of its movements, it is obvious that this intruder was
highly skilled at what it does.

Preston
(Da'minion)
